Time Management Hack: To avoid feeling envious of others' productivity, try implementing a time-blocking schedule. Set aside specific hours for tasks and avoid multitasking. This will help you stay focused and avoid feeling overwhelmed.

Mindfulness Practice: Practice mindfulness meditation to help you stay present and focused on your own tasks. Mindfulness can help you become more aware of your thoughts and emotions, allowing you to manage them more effectively.

Goal-Setting Strategy: Set specific, measurable, achievable, relevant, and time-bound (SMART) goals for yourself. Break down larger tasks into smaller, manageable steps, and track your progress. This will help you stay motivated and focused on your own goals.

Accountability Partner: Find an accountability partner who can help you stay on track with your tasks. This could be a friend, family member, or colleague who is also working towards similar goals. Regular check-ins can help you stay motivated and accountable.
